sg.edu.cs2103aug2015_w13_2j.storage

Class Storage

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.cs2103aug2015_w13_2j.storage.Storage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StorageInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StorageTest

    public class Storage
extends java.lang.Object
implements StorageInterface
    Storage component which provides methods to store and retrieve a list of Task objects to and from disk. Stores the user's preference for location of data file with the preference key.
    Author:
    Lu Yang Kenneth

      Sets the FunDUE data file to the provided File object and updates the user's data file path preference.

      • setDataFile

        public void setDataFile(java.io.File dataFile)
        Description copied from interface: StorageInterface
        Sets the FunDUE data file to the provided File object and updates the user's data file path preference. If the File object points to a non-existent file, the file will be created.
        Specified by:
        setDataFile in interface StorageInterface
        Parameters:
        dataFile - File object to be used as the new FunDUE data file. If null then this method does nothing.
